tabs.ariaLabel: Two different tabs: one for the e-service template details and the other for the subscribing parties

bottomActions.navigateTemplateVersions: Navigate to another version of the template

technicalInformations.title: E-service technical specifications
technicalInformations.description: In this section you can check the e-service specifications and make changes.

usefulLinks.title: Useful links
usefulLinks.implementAndManageEServiceTemplate: How to implement and manage an e-service template?
usefulLinks.updateEserviceInstance: How to update an e-service instance?

updateEServiceTemplateNameDrawer.title: Edit e-service template name
updateEServiceTemplateNameDrawer.subtitle: From this panel you can update the e-service template name. The changes will take effect immediately.

validation.sameValue: The e-service template name must be different from the current one

updateEServiceTemplateAudienceDrawer.title: Edit intended target of the template
updateEServiceTemplateAudienceDrawer.subtitle: From this panel you can update the intended target of the e-service template. The changes will take effect immediately.

validation.sameValue: The intended target of the template must be different from the current one

updateEServiceTemplateDescriptionDrawer.title: Edit e-service template description
updateEServiceTemplateDescriptionDrawer.subtitle: From this panel you can update the e-service template description. The changes will take effect immediately.

validation.sameValue: The e-service template description must be different from the current one

updateEServiceTemplateThresholdsDrawer.subtitle: From this panel you can update the parameters of your e-service template version. The changes will take effect immediately.

updateDocumentationDrawer.title: Edit documentation
updateDocumentationDrawer.subtitle: Now you can edit, download, and delete the documents attached to the e-service template.
updateDocumentationDrawer.interfaceInfoTooltip: The “API Specification” file cannot be edited. To update it, create a new version.

versionSelectorDrawer.title: Navigate to another version of this e-service template
versionSelectorDrawer.label: Select version

usingTenantTable.noDataLabel: This template has not yet been used by any parties.
usingTenantTable.noResultsLabel: The current search returned no results.

actions.createNewEServiceInstanceDisabled:
You have already created an instance from this
template.
actions.createInstanceDisabledTenantKind: The template cannot be used because the producer has not created a purpose for your party type

noMultiDataLabel: You have not yet created any e-service templates.

step1.detailsDescription: The information in this section cannot be modified by the implementers of the instances.

eserviceDescriptionField.label: What does this e-service allow you to do?

eserviceTemplateTechnologyField.label: What technology is your API built with?

eserviceTemplateModeField.label: Does the e-service produce or receive data?
eserviceTemplateModeField.tooltipReceiveMode: Currently the use of templates is limited to data producing

isSignalHubEnabled.label: Suggest the implementer to report data changes on Signal Hub

infoLabel.after: to generate notifications regarding data changes related to the e-service.

stepPurpose.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfoAlert: The contents of this step can no longer be modified after the publication of the first version of the e-service.

purposeTableSection.title: Purpose
purposeTableSection.description: Indicate the use cases for which you intend to collect data. For each purpose you must fill out a risk analysis.
purposeTableSection.noSelectedPurposesTooltip: You must indicate at least one purpose to continue

versionDescriptionField.label: What has changed in this version?

thresholdsSwitch.label: Suggest the implementer customized API threshold values

validation.min: The value cannot be lower than the API calls/day per consumer threshold

agreementApprovalPolicySection.label: Suggest the implementer to manually activate incoming service requests

tenantKindDialog.title: Select the risk analysis target
tenantKindDialog.description: Indicate who will be able to use the risk analysis you are creating.

tenantKind.labelPA: Public Administrations (Art. 2, paragraph 2, letter “a” of the Digital Administration Code)
tenantKind.labelNotPA: Public service managers, Publicly controlled companies (Art. 2, paragraph 2, letters “b” and “c”) or Private entities

step3.attributesDescription: Below indicate all those attributes, certified, verified or declared, that the consumer must possess to request the consuming of the e-service

createAttributeDrawer.subtitle: Once created, you will find the attribute in the list among those available to be added to an e-service

interface.title: Interface
interface.alert: You can upload a file without contact data, Terms and Conditions, and server addresses as they will be filled in by the implementer at a later stage.

description.rest: Upload a draft of the OpenAPI file describing the API.
description.soap: Upload a draft of the WSDL file describing the API

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Enter all the technical documentation useful for implementing an integration with this e-service

isSignalHubEnabled.label: Is the use of the data update service (Signal Hub) suggested?

dailyCallsPerConsumer.label: Suggested daily API call threshold per consumer

dailyCallsTotal.label: Suggested total daily API call threshold

notPublishableTooltip.label: One or more required fields have not been filled in. Complete the draft
